posts.post_content:
Buy the card not the holder.  No surcharge for the slab.
All prices include shipping and handling.  
PayPal F & F requested.  Checks or MOs accepted.   
Guaranteed Shipping in 2024 ;)

these cards will be sold.  Toward that end, the prices listed will be randomly changed, usually downward, but not always.  Price changes will not be announced when made.  You have to keep checking.  New prices will be in effect for at least 24 hours.  If you are interested in a specific card, let me know and make an offer if you choose.  That card will not be sold for less than your offer going forward.  I may just ask you to make your payment.  Current prices will be in the original post colored red, next to the original asking price.  
If you have any questions regarding this format, let me know.  

The thread will not be bumped by me for serial "price cuts", but at least one price will be changed daily.  You have to look.

New Pricing.

Time for a bump.

Next week I will be out of town, which will delay shipping a bit.
You might want to take another look.
PM sent on Fiene thanks Eddie
I'll take Hayden if available. PM coming
Frank I'll take Chase throwing for $333.
25 days is long enough.  The remaining cards will return sometime in the future, but for now they are being deleted.  Thanks to those who purchased.  Six cards were mailed yesterday.
